name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:**  Ignore intraluminal extension to adjacent segment(s) of colon; code depth of invasion or extra-appendiceal spread as indicated.

**Note 2:**  Code regional for tumor with macroscopic adhesions to other organs or structures and for pathologically confirmed tumor in adhesions.  However, if no tumor is present in adhesion(s) upon microscopic examination, code as indicated by the microscopically confirmed depth of tumor invasion for these cases (excluding adherence to liver, see Note 3). 

**Note 3:**  Adherence to the liver capsule is not considered distant metastasis.  Code regional for any adherence to the liver capsule.
